00015 #ifndef NINJA_PARSERS_H_
00016 #define NINJA_PARSERS_H_

00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <vector>
00020 #include <limits>

00022 using namespace std;
00023 
00024 struct BindingEnv;
00025 
00026 /// A single parsed token in an input stream.
00027 struct Token {
00028   enum Type {
00029     NONE,
00030     UNKNOWN,
00031     IDENT,
00032     RULE,
00033     BUILD,
00034     SUBNINJA,
00035     INCLUDE,
00036     NEWLINE,
00037     EQUALS,
00038     COLON,
00039     PIPE,
00040     PIPE2,
00041     INDENT,
00042     OUTDENT,
00043     TEOF
00044   };
00045   explicit Token(Type type) : type_(type) {}
00046 
00047   void Clear() { type_ = NONE; }
00048   string AsString() const;
00049 
00050   Type type_;
00051   const char* pos_;
00052   const char* end_;
00053 };
00054 
00055 /// Processes an input stream into Tokens.
00056 struct Tokenizer {
00057   Tokenizer(bool whitespace_significant)
00058       : whitespace_significant_(whitespace_significant),
00059         token_(Token::NONE), line_number_(1),
00060         last_indent_(0), cur_indent_(-1) {}
00061 
00062   void Start(const char* start, const char* end);
00063   bool Error(const string& message, string* err);
00064   // Call Error() with "expected foo, got bar".
00065   bool ErrorExpected(const string& expected, string* err);
00066 
00067   const Token& token() const { return token_; }
00068 
00069   void SkipWhitespace(bool newline=false);
00070   bool Newline(string* err);
00071   bool ExpectToken(Token::Type expected, string* err);
00072   bool ReadIdent(string* out);
00073   bool ReadToNewline(string* text, string* err,
00074                      size_t max_length=std::numeric_limits<size_t>::max());
00075 
00076   Token::Type PeekToken();
00077   void ConsumeToken();
00078 
00079   bool whitespace_significant_;
00080 
00081   const char* cur_;
00082   const char* end_;
00083 
00084   const char* cur_line_;
00085   Token token_;
00086   int line_number_;
00087   int last_indent_, cur_indent_;
00088 };
00089 
00090 /// Parses simple Makefiles as generated by gcc.
00091 struct MakefileParser {
00092   MakefileParser();
00093   bool Parse(const string& input, string* err);
00094 
00095   Tokenizer tokenizer_;
00096   string out_;
00097   vector<string> ins_;
00098 };
00099 
00100 struct State;
00101 
00102 /// Parses .ninja files.
00103 struct ManifestParser {
00104   struct FileReader {
00105     virtual bool ReadFile(const string& path, string* content, string* err) = 0;
00106   };
00107 
00108   ManifestParser(State* state, FileReader* file_reader);
00109 
00110   bool Load(const string& filename, string* err);
00111   bool Parse(const string& input, string* err);
00112 
00113   bool ParseRule(string* err);
00114   /// Parse a key=val statement.  If expand is true, evaluate variables
00115   /// within the value immediately.
00116   bool ParseLet(string* key, string* val, bool expand, string* err);
00117   bool ParseEdge(string* err);
00118 
00119   /// Parse either a 'subninja' or 'include' line.
00120   bool ParseFileInclude(Token::Type type, string* err);
00121 
00122   State* state_;
00123   BindingEnv* env_;
00124   FileReader* file_reader_;
00125   Tokenizer tokenizer_;
00126 };
